description: Manages files and directories in Cinnamon desktop environment.
Monitor bandwidth usage per process.
Create a sources.list file for a Debian mirror with the lowest latency.
Speed test for choosing a fast network server.
Query the status of network links.Manage the network configuration using systemd-networkd.
Switch primary group membership.
Allows configuration of tables, chains and rules provided by the Linux kernel firewall.Nftables replaces iptables.
Desktop background browser and setter for X Window.
Starts NixOS containers using Linux containers.
Inspect a NixOS configuration.
Reconfigure a NixOS machine.
Ask NetworkManager whether the network is connected.
Run nmcli as a NetworkManager secret agent or polkit agent.This subcommand can also be called with nmcli a.
Manage connections with NetworkManager.This subcommand can also be called with nmcli c.
Manage network interfaces and establish new Wi-Fi connections using NetworkManager.This subcommand can also be called with nmcli d.
Manage general settings of NetworkManager.This subcommand can also be called with nmcli g.
Monitor changes to the NetworkManager connection status.This subcommand can also be called with nmcli m.
Manage the networking status of NetworkManager.This subcommand can also be called with nmcli n.
Show the status of radio switches or enable/disable them using NetworkManager.This subcommand can also be called with nmcli r.
Manage the network configuration using NetworkManager.
A system administrator, tuner, and benchmark tool.
This command is an alias of nmtui connect.
This command is an alias of nmtui edit.
This command is an alias of nmtui hostname.
Text user interface for controlling NetworkManager.Use arrow keys to navigate, enter to select an option.
Alternative shell that prevents a user from logging in.
Command-line interface for NordVPN.
Uses the current desktop environment's notification system to create a notification.
The OpenStack project that provides a way to provision compute instances.
Run a new command in a running process' namespace.Particularly useful for docker images or chroot jails.
Snake game in the terminal.
Neo Simple X Image Viewer.
Fix common problems on an NTFS partition.
Synchronize and set the date and time via NTP.
Query the Network Time Protocol (NTP) daemon.
Control NUMA policy for processes or shared memory.
Control the number lock key status in X11 sessions.
Translate chemistry-related data.
Analyze the state stored in systemd-oomd.
A VPN client, for Fortinet's proprietary PPP+SSL VPN solution.
The OpenRC service manager.See also: rc-status, rc-update, and rc-service.
OpenVPN 3 Linux client.
A lightweight package manager used to install OpenWrt packages.

Version control for binary files similar to git but optimized for operating system root filesystems.OSTree is the foundation for immutable image-based operating systems such as Fedora Silverblue, Fedora IoT or Fedora CoreOS.
A utility for Arch Linux to build and install packages from the Arch User Repository.
A pacman cache cleaning utility.
Maintenance utility for .pacorig, .pacnew and .pacsave files created by pacman.
Operate on the Arch Linux package database.Modify certain attributes of the installed packages.See also: pacman.
Check each dependency specified and return a list of dependencies that are not currently satisfied on the system.See also: pacman.
Arch Linux package manager utility.See also: pacman, pkgfile.
Wrapper script for GnuPG used to manage pacman's keyring.See also: pacman.
Generate a pacman mirrorlist for Manjaro Linux.Every run of pacman-mirrors requires you to synchronize your database and update your system using sudo pacman -Syyu.See also: pacman.
Arch Linux package manager utility.See also: pacman.
Arch Linux package manager utility.See also: pacman.
Arch Linux package manager utility.See also: pacman.
Arch Linux package manager utility.See also: pacman.

Arch Linux package manager utility.See also: pacman-database, pacman-deptest, pacman-files, pacman-key, pacman-mirrors, pacman-query, pacman-remove, pacman-sync, pacman-upgrade.For equivalent commands in other package managers, see https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Pacman/Rosetta.
A text-based console game inspired by the original Pacman.
An AUR package manager for Ubuntu.
Arch Linux install script to install packages to the specified new root directory.
Package dependency tree viewer for pacman.
A command-line utility for the GUI package manager pamac.If you can't see the AUR packages, enable it in /etc/pamac.conf or in the GUI.
A partition manipulation program.See also: partprobe.
Notify the operating system kernel of partition table changes.
Parse a partition table and tell the kernel about it.
An AUR helper and pacman wrapper.
Temporarily suspends pulseaudio while another command is running to allow access to alsa.
Edit the Samba user database.For simple user add/remove/password, you can also use smbpasswd.
Convert PDF document pages to portable Pixmap (image formats).
N-up PDF pages.N-upping means putting multiple pages onto one page by scaling and rotating them into a grid.
Framework for Linux performance counter measurements.

Rename multiple files.NOTE: this page refers to the command from the util-linux package.For the Perl version, see file-rename or perl-rename.Warning: This command has no safeguards and will overwrite files without prompting.
Create, update or extract PHP archives (PHAR).
Deleted file recovery tool.It is recommended to write recovered files to a disk separate to the one being recovered from.
Disable PHP extensions on Debian-based OSes.
Enable PHP extensions on Debian-based OSes.
PHP extension manager for Debian-based OSes.
Lock all consoles and virtual terminals.
Compute decimal Archimedes' constant Pi.
Standalone compositor for Xorg.
Gets the ID of a process using its name.
Show system resource usage, including CPU, memory, IO etc.
Terminal interface for the Pi-hole ad-blocking DNS server.
View the current Raspberry Pi's GPIO pin-out information on the terminal with an ASCII diagram.
Easy security-hardened OpenVPN setup and manager.Originally designed for the Raspberry Pi, but works on other Linux devices too.
Command line client for PackageKit console program used by Discover and Gnome software and alternative to 'apt'.
Add a package to a CRUX system.
Authenticate pkgctl with services like GitLab.
Compare package files using different modes.See also: pkgctl.
Manage Git packaging repositories and their configuration for Arch Linux.See also: pkgctl.
Unified command-line frontend for Arch Linux devtools.
Tool for searching files from packages in the official repositories on arch-based systems.See also pacman files, describing the usage of pacman --files.
Query the package database on a CRUX system.
Make a binary package for use with pkgadd on CRUX.
Remove a package from a CRUX system.
Control media players via MPRIS.
Edit files in MATE desktop environment.
Report memory map of a process or processes.
Mount arbitrary hotpluggable devices as a normal user.
Print detailed information about and verify PNG, JNG, and MNG files.
Convert a file to a PO file.
Convert a PO file back to documentation format.The provided PO file should be the translation of the POT file which was produced by po4a-gettextize.
Update the translation (in PO format) of a documentation.
Update both PO files and translated documents.
Update/list the ports tree on a CRUX system.
Postfix mail transfer agent (MTA) control program.See also dovecot, a mail delivery agent (MDA) that integrates with Postfix.
Power off the system.
Make power profiles handling available over D-Bus.
Measures the power consumption of a computer that has a battery power source or supports the RAPL interface.
Optimize battery power usage.

Rename multiple files.NOTE: this page refers to the command from the util-linux package.For the Perl version, see file-rename or perl-rename.Warning: This command has no safeguards and will overwrite files without prompting.
Like cat but more colorful :).
An alias to a run-mailcap's action print.Originally run-mailcap is used to process mime-type/file.
Get or set process resource soft and hard limits.Given a process ID and one or more resources, prlimit tries to retrieve and/or modify the limits.
Manage Ubuntu Pro services.
A simple wrapper that runs Winetricks commands for Proton enabled games.
Connect to ProtonVPN.
Official ProtonVPN client.See also: protonvpn-cli-connect.
The CRUX package manager.
A convenient tool to show running processes as a tree.
Generate a permuted index of words from one or more text files.
The PulseAudio sound system daemon and manager.
Initialize a disk or partition for use as a physical volume.See also: lvm.
Display information about Logical Volume Manager (LVM) physical volumes.See also: lvm.
Display information about physical volumes.See also: lvm.
Play and record audio files through pipewire.
Manage a PipeWire instance's modules, objects, nodes, devices, links and much more.
Manage links between ports in PipeWire.
Tool for creating loopback devices in pipewire.
Play audio files through pipewire.Shorthand for pw-cat --playback.
Record audio files through pipewire.Shorthand for pw-cat --record.
Print name of current/working directory.
Print working directory of a process.
WPA/WPA2 cracking tool using computational power.
Translate input from gamepads or joysticks into keyboard strokes or mouse actions.
Clean up resources on QEMU/KVM Virtual Machine Manager like tap devices, VGPUs, etc.Called after a VM shuts down, crashes, etc.
Create a copy of virtual machine on QEMU/KVM Virtual Machine Manager.
Generate cloudinit configuration files.
Display the virtual machine configuration with pending configuration changes applied.
Create or restore a virtual machine on QEMU/KVM Virtual Machine Manager.
Delete virtual machine snapshots.
Destroy a virtual machine in QEMU/KVM Virtual Machine Manager.
Import a disk image to a virtual machine as an unused disk.The supported image formats for qemu-img, such as raw, qcow2, qed, vdi, vmdk, and vhd must be used.
Move a virtual disk from one storage to another within the same Proxmox cluster.
Resize a virtual machine disk in the Proxmox Virtual Environment (PVE).
Execute QEMU Guest Agent commands.
Print the status of the given pid started by the guest-agent on QEMU/KVM Virtual Machine Manager.
Execute a specific command via a guest agent.
Set the password for a specific user on QEMU/KVM Virtual Machine Manager.
Display help for a specific command.
